mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEKELY_DATE, COUNT(*) AS POST_COUNT FROM "POST" WHERE TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-6, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEKELY_DATE, COUNT(*) AS POST_COUNT FROM "POST" WHERE TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-6, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-5, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEKELY_DATE, COUNT(*) AS POST_COUNT FROM "POST" WHERE TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-5, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-4, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEKELY_DATE, COUNT(*) AS POST_COUNT FROM "POST" WHERE TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-4, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-3, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEKELY_DATE, COUNT(*) AS POST_COUNT FROM "POST" WHERE TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-5, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-2, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEKELY_DATE, COUNT(*) AS POST_COUNT FROM "POST" WHERE TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-2, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEKELY_DATE, COUNT(*) AS POST_COUNT FROM "POST" WHERE TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-0, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WEEKELY_DATE, COUNT(*) AS POST_COUNT FROM "POST" WHERE TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-0, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY WEEKELY_DATE DESC
SELECT TOPIC_NAME, COUNT(GROUP_NO) AS GROUP_COUNT FROM "GROUP" JOIN "GROUP_TOPIC" USING(TOPIC_CODE) GROUP BY TOPIC_NAME
SELECT TO_CHAR(SIGNUP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SIGNUP_DATE, COUNT(MEMBER_NAME) MEMBER_COUNT_WEEKLY FROM "MEMBER" WHERE SIGNUP_DATE >= SYSDATE - 7 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(SIGNUP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT TO_CHAR(SIGNUP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DEL_DATE, COUNT(MEMBER_NAME) MEMBER_COUNT_WEEKLY FROM "MEMBER" WHERE SIGNUP_DATE >= SYSDATE - 7 AND MEMBER_STATUS = 2 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(SIGNUP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
